channel.title: Subscription Length

item.title: Subscription Length
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
its in the php example already.

github.com

KeyAuth/KeyAuth-Python-Example/blob/main/main.py#L112

      
        
    
            
  1. #data = keyauthapp.webhook("WebhookID", "?type=resetuser&user=username")

    2. 
            
  2. 

    3. 
            
  3. #endregion

    4. 
            
  4. 

    5. 
            
  5. print("\nUser data: ") 

    6. 
            
  6. print("Username: " + keyauthapp.user_data.username)

    7. 
            
  7. print("IP address: " + keyauthapp.user_data.ip)

    8. 
            
  8. print("Hardware-Id: " + keyauthapp.user_data.hwid)

    9. 
            
  9. #print("Subcription: " + keyauthapp.user_data.subscription) ## Print Subscription "ONE" name

    10. 
            
  10. 

    11. 
            
  11. subs = keyauthapp.user_data.subscriptions ## Get all Subscription names, expiry, and timeleft

    12. 
            
  12. for i in range(len(subs)):

    13. 
            
  13.   sub = subs[i]["subscription"] # Subscription from every Sub

    14. 
            
  14.   expiry = datetime.utcfromtimestamp(int(subs[i]["expiry"])).strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') ## Expiry date from every Sub

    15. 
            
  15.   timeleft = subs[i]["timeleft"] ## Timeleft from every Sub

    16. 
            
  16. 

    17. 
            
  17.   print(f"[{i + 1} / {len(subs)}] | Subscription: {sub} - Expiry: {expiry} - Timeleft: {timeleft}")

    18. 
            
  18. 

    19. 
            
  19. 

    20. 
            
  20. print("Created at: " + datetime.utcfromtimestamp(int(keyauthapp.user_data.createdate)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'))

    21. 
            
  21. print("Last login at: " + datetime.utcfromtimestamp(int(keyauthapp.user_data.lastlogin)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'))

    22.
